entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story who is climbing the stone steps.

entities.name: stone steps
entities.description: A set of worn stone steps that Harry is climbing.

relationships.description: Harry is climbing the stone steps without making any noise.
Harry's head hit something hard, which turned out to be a trapdoor.
After opening the trapdoor, Harry found himself in a cellar full of wooden crates and boxes.
